title: Port conflict undetected when having both http and lambda
body:
### Describe the bug

In https://github.com/quarkiverse/quarkus-renarde/issues/121#issuecomment-1543676648 a user explained that when having both `amazon-lambda` and `resteasy-reactive` both extensions use the 8080 port, which appears to not be detected on MacOS, and throw an error on Linux.

When undetected, it caused really weird issues that made it hard to understand what was going on.

Perhaps we could detect that at the Quarkus level and throw a meaningful error when more than one extension wants to use the same port?
